knimeNode.name: QCPrecursorReader
knimeNode.shortDescription: Reads QC precursor summary from a CSV file generated with the QCExporter.

fullDescription.intro: Reads QC precursor summary from a CSV file generated with the QCExporter.

ports.inPort: CSV file containing the QC precursor summary created by the QCExporter.
ports.outPort: Table containing the QC precursor summary.
